import React,{useState,Fragment,useEffect} from 'react' import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {Link,useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import {login} from '../Store/Actions/authActions' import Loader from './Loader' import {useAlert} from 'react-alert' const Auth = () => { const alert = useAlert() const dispatch = useDispatch() const [email,setEmail] = useState('') const [password,setPassword] = useState('') const {isAuth,loading,er} = useSelector(state=>state.auth) let navigate = useNavigate() console.log(isAuth) useEffect(() => { if(isAuth) { navigate('/') } }) const Submit =(e) =>{ e.preventDefault() dispatch(login(email,password)) alert('Logged In') } return ( {loading ? :(
{er}

Login

setEmail(e.target.value)} />
setPassword(e.target.value)} />
Forgot Password? New User?
)}
) } export default Auth
